channel.title: Why do people mistake redirect immune for occ immune?
channel.description:
I've seen countless games now where a noble/phys is hung cause a drunk said he was occ immune.
We need to spread awareness that there's a difference. We can't let BD hang someone wrongly for this reason.
**#RedirectImmunityIsAThing**

item.title: Why do people mistake redirect immune for occ immune?
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
It shouldn’t. Like I said it is dynamic

Read full topic
item.source: Why do people mistake redirect immune for occ immune?

item.title: Why do people mistake redirect immune for occ immune?

item.description:
Good list, “Redirect Immune” should be one of the categories at the bottom of the class description card.

Read full topic
item.source: Why do people mistake redirect immune for occ immune?

item.title: Why do people mistake redirect immune for occ immune?
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
List:

Anyone with occupy immunity: Occupy and redirect immune always
Mystic: Never occupy immune, always redirect immune
Noble: Maid spy is redirect immune. Gossip is not. Never occupy immune
Physician: Self care is redirect immune. Heal is not. Never occupy immune
Mastermind: Never occupy immune, never redirect immune
Anyone successfully occupied: is redirect immune
Anyone who does nothing: is redirect immune

Therefore: if you have a Butler occupy someone the night a Drunk redirects that person you can cross reference the results to see with 100% certainty (baring mind warp) if any given player is Mastermind including N1-3

Read full topic
item.source: Why do people mistake redirect immune for occ immune?

item.title: Why do people mistake redirect immune for occ immune?
